hero.subtitle: Trust our certified technicians to install your Daikin HVAC system with precision and care, ensuring optimal performance and longevity. Professional installation is key to the efficiency and effectiveness of your HVAC system.

whyChoose.title: Why choose our installation services?
whyChoose.subtitle: Experience the Daikin difference with our expert installation services

certified.title: Certified Technicians
certified.description: All our installers are Daikin-certified and highly skilled.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: We use only genuine Daikin parts and adhere to manufacturer specifications.

fast.title: Fast and Efficient
fast.description: Most installations are completed within 1-2 days with minimal disruption.

warranty.title: Extended Warranty
warranty.description: Professional installation ensures the validity of the manufacturer's warranty.

process.title: Our Installation Process
process.subtitle: Six simple steps to a perfectly installed HVAC system

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.description: We assess your space, discuss your needs, and recommend the best Daikin system.

step2.title: Site Inspection
step2.description: Our technicians conduct a detailed inspection to plan the optimal installation layout.

step3.title: Custom Design
step3.description: We create a personalized installation plan tailored to your building's specifications.

step4.title: Professional Installation
step4.description: Our certified team installs the system with precision, adhering to all safety standards.

step5.title: Testing and Commissioning
step5.description: We thoroughly test all components to ensure everything works perfectly.

step6.title: Training and Handover
step6.description: We train you on system operation and provide all necessary documentation.

whatWeInstall.title: What We Install
whatWeInstall.subtitle: Comprehensive installation services for all Daikin products

items.4: Heat pumps for heating and cooling

guarantee.title: Our Installation Guarantee
guarantee.subtitle: We stand behind every installation with our comprehensive service guarantee

items.4: 24/7 emergency support for the first year

cta.title: Ready for clean air?
cta.subtitle: We simplify the switch to Daikin with a comprehensive approach – from energy audits to turnkey project coordination.

hero.title: Service
hero.subtitle: Keep your Daikin HVAC system running at peak performance with our expert maintenance services. Regular maintenance not only extends the lifespan of your equipment but also ensures optimal energy efficiency and indoor air quality.

specialistKnowledge.title: Specialist Knowledge
specialistKnowledge.description: We support achieving energy goals through expert system analysis, modernization planning, and compliance assistance.

regularInspections.title: Regular Inspections
regularInspections.description: We ensure the proper lifespan of equipment and provide the highest performance of solutions through specialized diagnostics and appropriate maintenance by the dedicated Daikin service team.

modernization.title: Modernization
modernization.description: We modernize HVAC systems to improve efficiency, reduce energy consumption, and enhance indoor comfort.

partsAndRepairs.title: Parts and Repairs
partsAndRepairs.description: We ensure reliable operation with original Daikin replacement parts and specialized repair services tailored to system needs.

cta.title: Take Care of Your Equipment
cta.subtitle: We are always at your disposal

hero.title: Latest News
hero.subtitle: Stay informed about the latest developments in HVAC technology, industry trends, and Daikin innovations

1.title: Daikin Expands Operations in Poland with New Service Center
1.excerpt: Daikin announces the opening of a state-of-the-art service center in Warsaw, strengthening its commitment to the Polish market and providing enhanced support for residential and commercial customers.

2.title: AI-Powered HVAC Systems: The Future is Here
2.excerpt: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing climate control. Learn how smart HVAC systems are optimizing energy consumption and improving indoor air quality through predictive maintenance and adaptive learning.

3.title: Sustainable Cooling: R-32 Refrigerant Leads the Way
3.excerpt: Daikin's commitment to environmental sustainability continues with expanded R-32 refrigerant adoption. This eco-friendly solution reduces global warming potential by 75% compared to traditional refrigerants.

4.title: Heat Pump Market Surges as Europe Moves Toward Electrification
4.excerpt: European heat pump installations reach record highs as governments push for renewable heating solutions. Industry experts predict continued growth through 2030, with Poland showing particularly strong adoption rates.

5.title: Smart Building Integration: IoT and HVAC Convergence
5.excerpt: The integration of Internet of Things (IoT) technology with HVAC systems is creating smarter, more efficient buildings. Discover how connected systems are reducing energy costs by up to 40%.

6.title: HVAC Market Trends: What to Expect in 2026
6.excerpt: Industry analysis reveals key trends shaping the HVAC market: increased demand for heat pumps, smart controls adoption, and focus on indoor air quality solutions driven by health consciousness.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter
newsletter.subtitle: Get the latest HVAC news and updates delivered to your inbox

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: AMM Salon is a leading authorized Daikin dealer and installer, specializing in high-quality air conditioning, heating, and ventilation solutions. Since 2009, we have been providing our customers with top-quality climate control systems.

daikin.title: Daikin
daikin.subtitle: As an official Daikin partner, we offer a full range of their innovative products, from home air conditioners to commercial HVAC systems. Our team of certified technicians ensures professional installation, maintenance, and support for every project.

1.title: Scheduling
1.description: Set schedules to change temperature and other settings according to your needs.

2.title: Device Status Information
2.description: Notifications about malfunctions, maintenance needs, or parameter changes.

3.title: Always in Control
3.description: Voice control with Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant allows hands-free operation.

4.title: Monitor Your Energy Consumption
4.description: User-friendly charts and icons help you see where you can save energy.

whyChoose.title: Our Values
whyChoose.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

craftsmanship.title: Craftsmanship
craftsmanship.description: Every installation is a craft for us. We ensure precise installation and work according to Daikin's rigorous standards — so the system works perfectly from the first start-up.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: Our relationship with the client is a collaboration, not a one-time transaction. We listen, advise, and explain — so that every decision is informed, and the installation is perfectly tailored to the needs.

development.title: Continuous Development and Certifications
development.description: We regularly upgrade our qualifications and update our knowledge about new Daikin technologies. We offer clients solutions that are in line with the latest trends and guarantee the highest efficiency.

responsibility.title: Responsibility at Every Stage
responsibility.description: We don't consider the project complete at installation. We take full responsibility for the system's operation, offering supervision, service, and advice throughout the entire lifespan of the equipment.

cta.title: Thinking about upgrading your HVAC system?
cta.subtitle: We simplify equipment replacement

cta.subtitle: Contact our experts today to find the perfect Daikin solution for your space.

hero.title: Air Conditioning Systems
hero.subtitle: Experience exceptional comfort with Daikin's innovative air conditioning solutions. Energy-efficient, reliable, and designed for your home.

products.title: Air Conditioning Systems
products.subtitle: Experience exceptional comfort with Daikin's innovative air conditioning solutions. Energy-efficient, reliable, and designed for your home.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Daikin Air Conditioning?
whyChoose.subtitle: Daikin devices lead the industry with innovative technology and excellent performance

left1.title: Excellent Performance
left1.description: Industry-leading SEER ratings that reduce energy costs while providing year-round comfort.

right1.title: Clean Air
right1.description: Multi-stage filtration systems remove allergens, dust, and odors for healthier indoor air quality.

right2.title: Excellent Comfort
right2.description: Advanced climate control technology ensures consistent temperature and humidity throughout the space.

hero.title: Heat Pump Systems
hero.subtitle: Experience exceptional comfort with Daikin's innovative heat pump solutions. Energy-efficient, reliable, and designed for your home.

products.title: Our Range of Heat Pumps
products.subtitle: Discover premium heating solutions for every space with Daikin's advanced heat pump technology. Efficient, eco-friendly, and perfect for year-round comfort.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Daikin Heat Pumps?
whyChoose.subtitle: Daikin devices lead the industry with innovative technology and excellent performance

left1.title: Durability and Reliability
left1.description: Japanese engineering guarantees long device lifespan. The technology is designed to operate stably even in the toughest conditions.

right1.title: Energy Efficiency
right1.description: Advanced Daikin technology extracts energy from the environment and converts it into heat with minimal electricity consumption.

right2.title: Year-Round Comfort
right2.description: The system automatically adjusts heating and cooling power to home conditions, maintaining the ideal temperature.

hero.title: Air Purifier Systems
hero.subtitle: Experience exceptional comfort with Daikin's innovative air purifier solutions. Energy-efficient, reliable, and designed for your home.

products.title: Air Purifiers
products.subtitle: Breathe cleaner, healthier air with Daikin's advanced air purification technology. Effectively removes pollutants, allergens, and odors.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Daikin Air Purifiers?
whyChoose.subtitle: Daikin devices lead the industry with innovative technology and excellent performance

left1.title: Effective Pollutant Capture
left1.description: HEPA filter captures dust and airborne substances along with harmful gases, while Streamer technology breaks down gases.

right1.title: Purification Efficiency
right1.description: Our unique tower structure draws air over a large area from 3 directions.

right2.title: Decomposition
right2.description: Streamer technology decomposes harmful substances trapped on the filter through oxidation.
